attributes.action: Support Boris Johnson's Brexit bill. The BRITISH  public VOTED LEAVE so support!
attributes.additional_details: We, as leave voters need to be heard loud and clear and the EU need to hear us too!  This is the deal we back and if you don't like it then we will back a no deal.  DO NOT IGNORE THE DEMOCRACY OF 17.4 MILLION VOTERS. We don't Gina Millers money but we do still have our voice. OUR VOTE SHOULD COUNT!!!!
attributes.background: Enough is enough. Boris has given the EU a new way forward, one that I believe is supported by many in government and parliament but I  believe it will get through more so if we finally take a stand yet again.
